name: .UC2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .UC2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In Windows, you can attempt to install UltraExpander II in a DOS emulator, such as DOSBox, and use it to decompress your UC2 archive.
In Linux, you can use the free program unuc2 to decompress your UC2 archive.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
